Argument.SQL:
SELECT			R.*, 
				CONCAT(R.RevenueProjectTitle, '') AS RevenueLookupCaption, 
				M.MemoTitle,
				'' AS _Other

FROM			ab_revenue AS R
	LEFT JOIN	ab_memo AS M ON M.MemoID  = R.MemoID

WHERE 1 = 1 AND R.RevenueProjectTittle LIKE '%eee%' 
ORDER BY RevenueProjectTitle ASC 
LIMIT 0, 200
